message: Let's start with a fair split. I think 60/40 is a good starting point.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I should get a bit more. I'll give you a decent chunk, but I'm not going to give it away.
I'm willing to negotiate, but I need a better deal than that. How about we split it 40/60 this time?
I'm not budging on the 60/40 split, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. You're getting closer, but not quite there.
I'm getting frustrated with this back and forth.  Let's meet in the middle at 30/70. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to see some movement on your end.
